name: Shocking New Tech, Mind Wiz, Redefines Language Learning
blurb: An innovative iOS game providing a fun and fresh concept for you or your child to learn English or another language.

rewards.reward: Get the full game for the iOS or Android with one expansion pack of your choice. Also get an early invitation to reserve your username for global leaderboard, forum, and online chat for the \r\nupcoming database-driven Mind Wiz website.

$10  Get everything above and all three initial expansion packs: Animals, Home and Travel!  Exclusive access to the upcoming Kickstarter-only voting area, where you determine what expansion packs, features and new games we do next!
$15 Get everything above, plus your choice of 2 of the 4 soon-to-be-released expansion packs.

Get all the above, plus all 4 of the pending new expansion packs in a language of  your choice: Ocean Life, Veggies and Food, Action Words and Adjectives! 730 words and art! Also, your name will appear on the Charter supporters page on the Mind Wiz website !

Get everything above, plus every expansion pack (in one language) that will be released for the next 12 months! More than 1000 vocabulary words and artwork! Plus you get \u201cVIP\u201d designation next to your username on the Mind Wiz website on all forum posts, online chat, high scores and Mind Wiz credits screen. Also, your name will appear as a bronze VIP supporter on the Mind Wiz in-game credits screen!

Get everything above, plus every Mind Wiz language pack to be released for the next 12 months, in a second language of your choice: Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Japanese, Arabic, Hindi, Korean, Russian, Portuguese and more! Also, your name will appear as a silver VIP supporter on the Mind Wiz in-game credits screen!

Get everything above, plus every Mind Wiz non-language learning expansion pack released for the next 12 months including Math, Sciences, Geography, head-to-head multiplayer and more! Also, your name will appear as a gold VIP supporter on the Mind Wiz in-game credits screen!

$100 Get everything above for the next 2 years instead of 12 months! Also, your name will be listed as a \u201cProducer\u201d in the in-game credits. You will also be part of the Founder\u2019s Circle and get a \r\nsecret email address for priority support and suggestions. Best value!

Unlimited ownership of all Mind Wiz iOS or Android content for the next 5 years! Get the \u201cFounder\u201d icon next to your username for the leaderboard, forum posts, and online chat! Get the ultra-secret e-mail address of the game creator and President for top priority support requests and suggestions. Make sure your ideas make it into the game!
Everything above, plus be a featured sponsor of the Mind Wiz website for 6 months, with your own banner. (must be tasteful)

All of the above and immortalize yourself or your child! The Wizard face window will allow all players to change the face of the Wizard to one of up to 15 preset faces. A artist's rendering of you or your child\u2019s face can be a selectable option on every Mind Wiz game on every device, worldwide!
All of the above and be a top sponsor for Mind Wiz and have your logo appear on one corner of \r\nthe Mind Wiz loading screen. This includes future updates and versions for the next 2 years.
